text: is a railway station located in Fushimi-ku, Kyoto, Kyoto Prefecture, Japan, on the Keihan Electric Railway Keihan Main Line. ==Layout== *This station has 2 side platforms with a track each. ==Surroundings== *Fushimi Inari-taisha *Inari Station (JR West Nara Line) ==Adjacent stations== ==References== ==See also== *Inari Station (JR) Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1910 Category:Railway stations in Kyoto
title: Fushimi-Inari Station
